name: Brew Balls
description:
It's like pong, but you can apply magical effects to the ball with every hit.

Use your UP and DOWN keys to move your cauldron, while LEFT and RIGHT will cycle through different poisonous potion ingredients.

Use deadly botanicals like Mandrake and Deadly Nightshade to put unpredictable spins on the ball to throw off your opponent. 

The first player to reach a score of 10 is the winner.

------------------------------------------------------------------

Left Player - WASD

Right Player - Arrow Keys

Esc - Return to Main Menu

------------------------------------------------------------------

Gameplay, programming, pixel art, and music by Ian Guglielmi-White.

Witch Announcer Voice by Tyler Hindman

Alkhemikal font by jeti from fontenddev.com

First Fontasy font by Stacy Kendra

This game was made for the SGDA 2022 Thanksgiving Jam. 
Jam Theme: "Pick your poison"
